name: Проверка ограничений длины поля name при создании токена
statusMessage:
AssertionError: status code: 404, text: Error 
Cannot POST /v4/CreatePersonalAccessToken
assert 404 == 200 + where 404 = .status_code
statusTrace:
owner_client = main_space = '6866309d85fb8d104544a61e' token_name = 'xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx' expected_status = 200 @allure.title("Проверка ограничений длины поля name при создании токена") @pytest.mark.parametrize( "token_name, expected_status", [ ("x" * 100, 200), ("x" * 101, 400), ], ids=["ровно 100 символов", "101 символ (слишком длинное имя)"] ) def test_token_name_length_limit(owner_client, main_space, token_name, expected_status): with allure.step(f"Пробуем создать токен с длиной name = {len(token_name)}"): response = create_token(owner_client.token, main_space, token_name) > assert response.status_code == expected_status, f"status code: {response.status_code}, text: {response.text}" E AssertionError: status code: 404, text: E E E E Error E E E 
Cannot POST /v4/CreatePersonalAccessToken
E E E E assert 404 == 200 E + where 404 = .status_code tests/test_backend/personal_access_tokens/test_create_personal_access_token.py:105: AssertionError
